name: Seven7
description:
Seven7 (Embrace the Clunk) 

Dive into the most clunky 3rd Person platformer ever created by man! From high ambitions of creating a game like ALT F4 I present Seven7.

This is a small game that I've been developing with an outdated game engine called CopperCube 6. This was a challenging undertaking for me, but I completed it on time.

The game is incomplete and riddled with issues, the majority of them stem from the game engine's flaws.

I hope you like playing this game, and I look forward to hearing your thoughts!

DISCLAIMER

This game is far from flawless, and you will almost certainly encounter bugs.

GG!

thechitomahn.
